verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H2583>camp,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> by his own <S%H1714>standard,<s%> with the <S%H226>banners<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households;<s%> they shall <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> at a <S%H4480>distance.<s%> <S%H5048><s%>

"Now those who <S%H2583>camp<s%> on the <S%H9506>east<s%> <S%H9506>side<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise<s%> [shall be] of the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 74600.

"And those who <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5921>next<s%> to him [shall be] the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar:<s%> <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 54400.

"Then [comes] the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun:<s%> <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even his <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 57400.
"The <S%H3605>total<s%> of the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> 186400, by their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> They shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out <S%H7223>first.<s%>

"On the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H8486>side<s%> [shall be] the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben:<s%> <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 46500.

"And those who <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5921>next<s%> to him [shall be] the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon:<s%> <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 59300.
"Then [comes] the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad:<s%> <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 45650.
"The <S%H3605>total<s%> of the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben:<s%> 151450 by their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> And they shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out <S%H8145>second.<s%>

"Then the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out [with] the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4264>camps;<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as they <S%H2583>camp,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out, <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H3027>place,<s%> by their <S%H1714>standards.<s%>

"On the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H3220>side<s%> [shall be] the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> [shall be] <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 40500.

"And <S%H5921>next<s%> to him [shall be] the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 32200.

"Then [comes] the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 35400.
"The <S%H3605>total<s%> of the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> 108100, by their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> And they shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out <S%H7992>third.<s%>

"On the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6828>side<s%> [shall be] the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan:<s%> <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5996>Ammishaddai,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 62700.

"And those who <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5921>next<s%> to him [shall be] the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher:<s%> <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ochran,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 41500.

"Then [comes] the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and the <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali:<s%> <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan,<s%>
and his <S%H6635>army,<s%> even their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, 53400.
"The <S%H3605>total<s%> of the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> [was] 157600. They shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out <S%H314>last<s%> by their <S%H1714>standards.<s%>"

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households;<s%> the <S%H3605>total<s%> of the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H4264>camps<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies,<s%> 603550.

The <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> however, were not <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Thus the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did;<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H2583>camped<s%> by their <S%H1714>standards,<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H5265>set<s%> out, <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> by his <S%H4940>family,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to his father's <S%H1004>household.<s%>
